identificationModule.briefTitle: New Stent Retriever, VERSI System for AIS
identificationModule.officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety of VERSI System for Acute Ischemic Stroke

descriptionModule.briefSummary: To confirm efficacy and safety of VERSI system for acute ischemic stroke
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: Efficacy; TICI 2a or more recanalization upto 3 pass of study device Safety; symptomatic intracranial hemorrhage within 24 hours of procedure

primaryOutcomes.measure: incidence of treatment-related severe adverse event

secondaryOutcomes.measure: recovery to independent life {modified Rankin score of 2 or less]
secondaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of subjects who have modified Rankin Scale (mRS) score of 2 or less
incidence of symptomatic and asymptomatic intracranial hemorrhage
Proportion of subjects who have modified Rankin Scale (mRS) score of 2 or less or back to baseline of mRS

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Severe adverse event related to device
secondaryOutcomes.description: Any severe adverse event related to device
rate of immediate reperfusion with the device upto 3 path measured using Thrombolysis in Cerebrovascular Infarction (TICI) score of 2b or greater

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* onset to treat within 8 hours
* NIHSS 8 or more
* ASPECTS 5 or more
* Target vessel is ICA, MCA, VA, BA, PCA
* non-eligible or failed IV rt-PA

Exclusion Criteria:

* known hemorrhagic tendency
* arterial dissection, vasculitis
* allergy for contrast media
* other inappropriate condition

overallOfficials.name: Nobuyuki Sakai, MD DMSc
overallOfficials.affiliation: Kobe City Medical Center General Hospital, Kobe, Japan

references.citation: Sakai N, Imamura H, Adachi H, Tani S, Tokunaga S, Funatsu T, Suzuki K, Adachi H, Sasaki N, Kawabata S, Akiyama R, Horiuchi K, Ohara N, Kono T, Fujiwara S, Kaneko N, Tateshima S. First-in-man experience of the Versi Retriever in acute ischemic stroke. J Neurointerv Surg. 2019 Mar;11(3):296-299. doi: 10.1136/neurintsurg-2018-014040. Epub 2018 Sep 27.
